mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '광고' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE rownum = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RANK, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, SCREENING, RUNNING_TIME, GENRE, SYNOPSIS, ROUND(NVL(RATIO_TO_REPORT(TICKET_COUNT) OVER(),0)*100, 1) AS RATIO, NVL(MOVIE_IMG_PATH, 'null') MAIN_POSTER, SCORE, TICKET_COUNT FROM(SELECT P.MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, MOVIE_IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(TICKET_NO) FROM TICKETING_INFO C JOIN SEAT_CHECK USING(TICKET_NO) WHERE P.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO) TICKET_COUNT, NVL((SELECT ROUND(AVG(SCORE),1) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R WHERE P.MOVIE_NO = R.MOVIE_NO), 0) SCORE, SCREENING, GENRE FROM MOVIE P LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='메인슬라이드') I ON(P.MOVIE_NO = I.MOVIE_NO) WHERE SCREENING = 'C' ORDER BY TICKET_COUNT DESC, RELEASE_DATE)) WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RANK, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS FROM(SELECT P.MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, MOVIE_IMG_PATH FROM MOVIE P LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='메인슬라이드') I ON(P.MOVIE_NO = I.MOVIE_NO) WHERE SCREENING = 'P' ORDER BY RELEASE_DATE)) WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo}
SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM PERSON_INFO WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND PERSON_ROLE = '감독'
SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM PERSON_INFO WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND (PERSON_ROLE IS NULL OR PERSON_ROLE != '감독')
SELECT MOVIE_IMG_PATH FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '스틸컷'

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.SCORE, R.REVIEW_DATE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.USER_NO, I.USER_NICKNAME, R.MOVIE_NO FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN USER_INFO I ON (R.USER_NO = I.USER_NO) WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND REVIEW_DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "beansGarden".MOVIE_REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, USER_NO, MOVIE_NO, REVIEW_DELETE_FL) VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{score}, SYSDATE, #{reviewContent}, #{userNo}, #{movieNo}, DEFAULT,DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO "beansGarden".REPORT (REPORT_NO, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_CONTNENT, REPORT_ENROLL_DATE, REPORT_FL, REPORT_DELETE_FL, REVIEW_NO, REPORT_WIRTER, REPORTED_USER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{reviewNo}, #{reportWriter}, #{reportedUserNo})
